document.full_text: a summit of arab leaders has been postponed by a year to march 2012 because of turmoil in the region, but will still be held in iraq as originally planned, the arab league said on thursday.
document.title: arab league delays summit by year to march 2012
lines_and_colors: a summit of arab leaders has been postponed by a year to march 2012 because of turmoil in the region, but will still be held in iraq as originally planned, the arab league said on thursday.
